cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.DM, cs.GT, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the diffusion of ideas or technologies on social networks, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of social networks (cs.SOC) and social and information networks (cs.SI). The paper also discusses the Linear Threshold Model, which is a popular model in the field of network science and falls under the sub-category of discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The paper also mentions the Influence Maximization problem, which is a problem in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) related to identifying the most influential nodes in a network. Finally, the paper discusses hardness results, which is a topic that falls under the sub-category of theoretical computer science (cs.GT).
